mapper.select: SELECT inq.INQUIRY_ID , inq.INQUIRY_TITLE, u.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, inq.INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, inq.user_id FROM GGHJ_USER u JOIN GGHJ_UNI uni ON u.USER_ID = uni.USER_ID JOIN GGHJ_INQUIRY inq ON uni.UNI_ID = inq.USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT inq.INQUIRY_ID, inq.INQUIRY_TITLE, k.name AS nickname, inq.INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, inq.user_id FROM GGHJ_KAKAO k JOIN GGHJ_UNI uni ON k.kakao_id = uni.KAKAO_ID JOIN GGHJ_INQUIRY inq ON uni.UNI_ID = inq.USER_ID ORDER BY INQUIRY_ID desc

SELECT INQUIRY_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, user_id, INQUIRY_PUblIC, inquiry_response FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, INQUIRY_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, user_id, inquiry_public, inquiry_response FROM ( SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, CASE WHEN U.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN U.USER_NICKNAME ELSE K.NAME END AS NICKNAME, I.INQUIRY_CREATED_DATE, i.user_id, i.inquiry_public, i.inquiry_response FROM GGHJ_INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN GGHJ_UNI UNI ON I.USER_ID = UNI.UNI_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_USER U ON UNI.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_KAKAO K ON UNI.KAKAO_ID = K.KAKAO_ID ORDER BY I.INQUIRY_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{inquiryPage} * #{inquiryAmount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{inquiryPage} - 1) * #{inquiryAmount}
